file_content.text: Master Jedi, the numerous reports of your gleaming saber cutting a swath through Imperial scum would overwhelm any lesser droid's processors!
Captain, I've been hearing no end of your actions across the galaxy. Your talents as a soldier almost outshine your abilities as a pilot!
You'll be happy to know that victories involving you were referenced by a statistically significant number of new recruits as their inspiration for joining!
Thanks to our efforts, recruitment is at an all-time high!
Does this mean the Republic will turn their attention to the Eternal Empire now?
I'm happy to stomp Imperials just for the sake of it, but that's good to hear.
Being a lover of totalitarian subjugation is reason enough for a sound beating! Something the people of Zakuul should learn.
I can't take satisfaction in these victories when they've done nothing to stop the greater threat.
The Republic stands stronger thanks to you.
I can't say whether command is ready to counter-strike our new enemy, but this droid is ready to get back in the fight.
With my assignment complete here, I could request a transfer to join your Alliance as an attache from the Republic military.
I'd greatly appreciate official support from the Republic.
Together we will be an unstoppable force of galactic liberation!
If that includes turning Skytroopers to scrap, we'd be glad to have you.
Any droid that can be mass-produced can be mass-reduced!
No more morale-boosting duties. You'll be strictly a combat droid. Preferably a quiet one.
I am not optimized for stealth operations, but I'm certain my versatile design can adapt as needed!
Nothing will halt my onslaught straight to the Eternal Throne! Onward!
Those dirty Imps are scattering like vermin. Filthy, totalitarian vermin!
Against the stalwart spirit of the Republic, those spineless Imperials are all but on the run!
The march to victory is a long, hard climb over a mountain of Imperial bodies. I'm happy to report the mounds are growing!
Good to hear.
There truly is no rest for the wicked. The Imperial hordes continue their suicide march into our territory.
[Requires Participation in 20 Warzones] You're needed in the field more than you are here.
I'll help when I can.
Two tyrannical Empires straddle our beloved galaxy, seeking to stamp out the virtues of democracy.
So we must be doubly prepared to deliver a righteous boot of our own against these oppressors!
[Continue Listening]
In the face of such depravity, more and more of our fellow citizens are exercising their right to enlist.
Cloaked in the enduring mantle of the armed forces, these proud recruits are nurtured in the chrysalis of liberty. Emerging from their training as glorious butterflies of... hmm.
Oh, pardon me! I was devoting one-hundred percent of my processing power to my inspirational protocols.
Why, sir! I always knew you'd be out there listening.
You're the one broadcasting all those messages for the Republic war effort.
Master Jedi!
Greetings, Captain!
That's some speech you're working on.
It's humbling to find that my calls to action resonate with such a renowned member of your order.
There's a sentiment I can get behind. Never underestimate the value of a well-placed boot!
High praise coming from a member of the Coruscant Aegis!
It's an honor to finally meet you. Your volunteer record is truly an inspiration to non-combatants everywhere!
M1-4X, Republic Special Forces, on temporary assignment with the Press Corps.
Nice to meet you, M1-4X.
Flattered as I am, I know a decorated hero such as yourself doesn't require my bracing speeches, but I have others I must reach.
What's a battle droid doing composing propaganda?
I may be a droid, but within this armored chassis hums the core of a patriot!
What a waste of resources.
While not my primary function, leadership and inspiration are core parts of my programming.
Now there's a voice I could never forget.
And one the Republic's enemies dread hearing, sir!
When did you go all talk and no action on me, Forex?
Shortly after your unfortunate "demise," sir!
Though my blaster cannons are silent, my vocoder has become another booming weapon for freedom. One meant to battle fear and complacency.
My duty here is to instill a greater sense of purpose in the people. Now more than ever, the Republic needs its citizens to stand up and fight!
Does your duty include telling those people what they're really up against?
The misdeeds of our vile enemies are as much a motivator as our own valorous conduct, but reports of Republic victories are what I long for.
With more veterans such as yourself returning to the fight, I'm certain the galaxy will be back in the hands of good without delay!
My only regret is not being able to assist you on your top secret mission all these years.
There was no mission, Forex. I was a POW.
Aha, I understand now! I would choose a more believable cover story, but your secret is safe with me, sir.
Top secret mission?
Surely you have been on a mission of utmost secrecy, and making our enemies believe that you were killed was vital for operational success.
I could have used Havoc with me for all I've been through.
The strategic minds of our commanders must have had good reason to split us up as they did.
As you can see, my own reassignment was greatly needed. After the success of my Morale Initiative, command knew the Press Corps could count on me.
Recruitment and voluntary redeployment are up fourteen percent since I joined. Soon, we will be able to finally drive out the forces of injustice!
Anything I could do to help with that?
Continue to lead by your unimpeachable example!
Every time you deliver victory against our depraved enemies, the sovereignty of our Republic is planted firm.
I'm on a recruitment drive of my own. I'm assembling an Alliance against the Eternal Empire.
I, for one, would love to give the erroneously named "Eternal" Empire a taste of high-yield justice, but we can't show our backs to those treacherous Sith!
Until the home front is secure, my place is here, making sure those Imps have to claw for every micrometer!
And of course you thought of me, sir! I would be honored to serve under such a fine command as yours again.
Under your exemplary leadership I will have no shortage of valorous deeds to supply to the Press Corps.
I never thought I'd see you so far from the front lines, Forex.
It has felt like an unbearable amount of time since I've emancipated a world from the iron grip of despots.
Sir! It occurs to me that serving directly under you once again would provide the Press Corps with ample feats of heroism.
I'm certain I could persuade my superiors that a joint operation is the best course of action.
Glad to have you back.
Better shake off the rust. We're in for some serious fighting.
Not a single component in my ingenious construction is susceptible to rust, corrosion, or cowardice, sir!
Alright, but you don't release details of our missions without my go-ahead.
I wouldn't dream of compromising your operational security, sir!
My actuators are shivering with anticipation. M1-4X is ready for action!
Keep up the good fight!
[Requires Valor Rank 40] I've defeated countless enemies of the Republic already!
